name: One Minute - a Time Puzzle Game
name_original: One Minute - a Time Puzzle Game
description:
One Minute Puzzle Game!

- is a game of skill and puzzles and a bit of logic, where you can become a Cube or a Ball, test the advantages and disadvantages of being one way or the other.

In One Minute Use your skills the best way you can, but be careful! you only have one minute to solve each level, don't run out of time.

Features:

- 40 levels to solve and complete in the best possible time.

- You have two types of shapes to become (Cube and Ball) one is less or more skillful than the other in solving a task, choose the one that suits you best.

- No ads or in-game purchases

- Minimalistic graphics and a relaxing atmosphere

Do not hesitate and join this new challenge and most importantly enjoy ONE MINUTE GAME.
